page.title: 01HEADINGTON,MARSTON & BARTON.
page.content: {GENERAL FEATURES-}Our block is a mainly residential area bordering the North-East edge of Oxford City. It is typical of a suburban area, with a mixed income population with no really depressed areas. {JOHN RADCLIFFE HOSPITAL-}Viewed from the Ring Road, it stands prominently on the sky-line. It is a teaching hospital, internationally famous for its medical research. {OXFORD UNITED FOOTBALL CLUB (OUFC)-} Developed from Headington United FC and saved from extinction by Mr Maxwell's intervention and money. {SHOPPING PRECINCT-}It serves many people on the East side of the city. {YOUTH HOSTEL-}Many young visitors, British and foreign, use its facilities. {THE CREMATORIUM-}It provides a fitting farewell from this life.
